message.body: ï¿¼Check out this random bulldog in an ad for cancer treatment
"But like, could we get a bulldog in there?" Graphic designer: SIGH, yeah, sure
This bulldog is gonna examine toxicity profiles and get you the perfect chemo regimen! He is right near the word smart!
Very deep thought went into all aspects of that photo and it's placement in the ad
Omg!! I had no idea he was so smart until I saw him in glasses!
Clearly you should be running the design group, not me. You've got ideas!
I think you should propose upping the bulldog content in all graphics so you look more respectable and serious
I'm full of em! In other design news the product I work on got a phallic new logo and I just don't even. Maybe you should come work here!
Lol! Nice. I specialize in phallic logos
Ok so here's a summary: 1. More bulldogs 2. Everything's better when it looks like a dick. Look out, design world!
I believe you've earned an honorary design degree
Lol!! I'll wait to hear from Helvetica university
